description: This Python script demonstrates how to set up and use Weaviate as a vector database for semantic search within a larger project. It includes configuration instructions, imports, instantiation of a Weaviate object, creation of a knowledge base, and an agent to perform a search query.

classes.name: Weaviate
classes.description: Class representing the Weaviate vector database connection and configuration.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Class for creating a knowledge base from PDF URLs, integrated with the vector database.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Class representing an agent that interacts with the knowledge base and performs searches.

methods.name: aload
methods.description: Asynchronous method to load or reload the knowledge base.

methods.name: aprint_response
methods.description: Asynchronous method to generate and print a response based on a query.
